DOC.detailed_description: The inclusion criterion include patient present drug-resistant angina pectoris underwent balloon resistant angioplasty . The exclusion criterion include : 1 . Acute myocardial infarction within 28 day ; 2 . Intolerance aspirin , clopidogrel , contrast medium , statin ; 3 . Angiographic visible thrombus , dissection ; 4 . Left ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) < 35 % ; 5 . Any type cancer 6 . Hemorrhagic stroke
